page.title: 11POPULATION
page.content: THE POPULATION OF THE NORTHWICH BLOCK HAS FOR MANY YEARS BEEN A VERY CLOSE-KNIT COMMUNITY.BECAUSE OF THE AVAILABILITY OF WORK AT THE SALT WORKS AND AT THE ICI CHEMICAL WORKS,THERE HAS BEEN VERY LITTLE MOVEMENT OF THE POPULATION IN THE PAST.THIS HAS LED TO CLOSE FAMILY LINKS IN THE BLOCK WITH MANY GENERATIONS LIVING IN CLOSE PROXIMITY. MORE RECENTLY,HOWEVER,WITH A DECLINE IN THE SALT INDUSTRY AND WITH MOVEMENT OF ICI TO A MORE EFFICIENT LOCATION AT RUNCORN,THERE HAS BEEN CONSIDERABLE MOVEMENT OF THE POPULATION.MUCH OF IT HAS BEEN AWAY FROM NORTHWICH TO THE SOUTH OF ENGLAND FOLLOWING THE NATIONAL TREND.THIS HAS BEEN COUNTERED BY A MOVEMENT OF THE POPULATION FROM THE CITY AREAS OF LIVERPOOL AND MANCHESTER.MANY PEOPLE WHO LIVE IN NORTHWICH COMMUTE DAILY TO WORK IN THESE CITIES.
